Name: Journey of Greed
About the game: **************************************************************** **** If you ran into an issue, or have any feedback, **** please join this discord channel and send us a message: (we'll respond faster this way) **** **************************************************************** This is a perfect hybrid of a social board game and strategy card game. You play as a pirate... adventurer in the Age of Discovery, heading into the lost islands along side three other adventurers. As you dive deeper and deeper into the adventure, things become more dangerous and enticing, only the bravest and smartest can take the treasure out alive. You'll make many different hard choices during the adventure: Continue for more or escape with what you have? Co-operate with other players or stabs them in the back? Prepare for the incoming danger or risk for more reward? You'll find your answers in the Journey of Greed. Share Less Take a Little Hit and Run Self Provide Difference between the demo and full version: 1. You can only open 10 “Barrels” in the demo. 2. You can't play Ladder mode after passing Rookie in the Demo 3. The demo and full version share the same server, so your data will persist once you get the full version.
